analysis.description:
ElcoinICO.withdrawToken (/unique_chucks/8/0x98734f75997de18ccf9a495805b4e01b2f8b0cbb.sol#141-146) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-_token.transfer(team,_value) (/unique_chucks/8/0x98734f75997de18ccf9a495805b4e01b2f8b0cbb.sol#146)

ELC.withdrawToken (/unique_chucks/8/0x98734f75997de18ccf9a495805b4e01b2f8b0cbb.sol#470-476) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-_token.transfer(where,_value) (/unique_chucks/8/0x98734f75997de18ccf9a495805b4e01b2f8b0cbb.sol#476)

Reentrancy in ElcoinICO.mintPresaleTokens (/unique_chucks/8/0x98734f75997de18ccf9a495805b4e01b2f8b0cbb.sol#192-209):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(elc.totalSupply() + _elcValue <= tokensForSale) (/unique_chucks/8/0x98734f75997de18ccf9a495805b4e01b2f8b0cbb.sol#205-206)
	- elc.mint(_investor,_elcValue) (/unique_chucks/8/0x98734f75997de18ccf9a495805b4e01b2f8b0cbb.sol#206)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- presaleSold (/unique_chucks/8/0x98734f75997de18ccf9a495805b4e01b2f8b0cbb.sol#209)

ElcoinICO.endTime should be constant (/unique_chucks/8/0x98734f75997de18ccf9a495805b4e01b2f8b0cbb.sol#13)
ElcoinICO.startTime should be constant (/unique_chucks/8/0x98734f75997de18ccf9a495805b4e01b2f8b0cbb.sol#12)

StandardToken.decreaseApproval (/unique_chucks/8/0x98734f75997de18ccf9a495805b4e01b2f8b0cbb.sol#397-421) should be declared external
